pages.text:
Monday Night Out
Monday September 8th
Every Monday
Every Monday | Starting at 4 PM
Mondays just got a major upgrade! Whether you’re winding down after a long shift or kicking off your week with some fun, join us for a vibrant evening that celebrates our local community and hospitality heroes.
What to Expect:
Exclusive Perks: Show your hospitality badge or business card and receive 20% off your tab—our way of saying thanks for all you do.
Prize Drawings: Every guest who checks in with a badge or card is automatically entered into our weekly giveaway. Prizes range from gift cards to local experiences!
Live Music: Enjoy a rotating lineup of talented local musicians bringing the energy and setting the vibe from 4 PM onward.
Community Connection: Mingle with fellow locals, industry pros, and creatives in a laid-back, welcoming atmosphere. Starting 9/8/25, have your opportunity to meet the new hotel leadership during the evening.
Why You’ll Love It:
Whether you’re in the service industry or just love supporting local spots, this night is for you. Come for the discounts, stay for the music, and leave with new friends and maybe even a prize!
04:00 PM – 10:00 PM
The Wine Society – California Edition
Tuesday September 9th
Join us on September 9th from 6–8 PM for a sophisticated waterfront wine tasting experience. Each month, we explore a different region of the world through wine through a curated tasting of four wines: two reds and two whites.
Your ticket includes:
Tasting of 4 wines
Amuse-bouche pairings
Complimentary valet parking
Location: Hotel Zamora, St. Pete Beach
Date & Time: Tuesday, September 9 · 6:00–8:00 PM
Purchase Your Ticket Here
Sip globally, savor locally. Secure your ticket now – spaces are limited! Must be 21+ to attend.
06:00 PM – 08:00 PM
Rum on the Rooftop featuring Papa's Pilar Rum
Thursday September 18th
Join us on the rooftop for an evening of music, cocktails, and skyline views. Free to attend.
On Wednesday, September 18, we’re hosting a sunset party featuring a live DJ, Papa’s Pilar rum specials, and delicious food pairings.
Each guest will receive one complimentary shot at sunset to toast the night in style. Signature rum cocktails will be available for purchase along with rooftop bites, and valet parking is complimentary for all attendees.
Raise a glass, soak in the views, and celebrate golden hour from the best seat in the city.
RSVP HERE
06:00 PM – 09:00 PM
